set-payload.value: #[output json --- message: "invoice not found for customer " ++ (vars.invoiceId default "unknown")]
set-payload.doc:name: Invoice not found

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/csv
fun typeOccupationFunction(texte)=( texte match { case "ACCT" -> "M" case "CLD" -> "M" case "LM" -> "M" case "CLM" -> "M" case "MO" -> "M" case "MP"-> "M" else -> texte } )
fun natureOccupation(nature)=( nature match { case "ACCT" -> "Accident de travail" case "CLD" -> "Congé longue durée" case "LM"-> "Congé longue maladie" case "MO" -> "Congé maladie ordinaire" case "MP"-> "Maladie professionnelle" else -> nature } ) fun operationFunction(operation)=( if (operation == "SUP") "S" else if (operation == "CRE") "X" else operation )
fun dateFunction(dateField, jour)=( (dateField as Date {format: "dd/MM/yyyy"} as String {format: "yyyyMMdd"}) ++ "000000 " ++ jour ) ---
payload map (item)-> do{ var itemLine = valuesOf(item)[0] as String var fields = itemLine splitBy ";" --- { "matricule" : fields[1], "codeCentre": "", "typeOccupation" : typeOccupationFunction(fields[6]), "natureOccupation": natureOccupation(fields[6]), "dateDebut": dateFunction(fields[2], fields[8]), "dateFin": dateFunction(fields[3], fields[8]), "statut": "", "poids": "", "tempsTravail": "", tempsPresenceHeures: "", tempsPresenceMinutes: "", idTypeCompteur: "", nbTitreRestaurant: "", commentaire: "", "operation": operationFunction(fields[0]) } }

logger.doc:name: After Read SFTP Request
After Read SFTP Request

set-variable.value:
#[output json
var productAdded = vars.product
var productFilteredById = payload filter ( $.id == (productAdded.id) as String )
---
productFilteredById]

set-payload.value: #[output json --- message: "The product has been created successfully"]
set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload

logger.doc:name: After Read SFTP Request

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
output csv header = true
var productId = vars.productId
fun stockFunction(stock, id) = if(id == productId) stock + 1 else stock
--- payload map((item, index) -> {
"id": item.id, "name": item.name, "category" : item.category, "price" : item.price, "stock" : stockFunction(item.stock, item.id) })

set-payload.value: #[output json --- message: "The stock has been changed successfully"]
set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload

logger.doc:name: After Read SFTP Request
After filtering product

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
output csv header = true
var productId = vars.productId var quantity = vars.quantity
fun stockFunction(stock, id) = if(id == productId) (stock as Number) - (quantity as Number) else stock
var data = payload map(item, index) -> {
id: item.id, name: item.name, category : item.category, price : item.price, stock : stockFunction(item.stock, item.id) }
---
data filter $.stock > 0

output csv header = true
var filteredProducts = payload filter ($.id != vars.productId)
---
filteredProducts

set-payload.value: #[output json --- message: "The changes has been aplied successfully"]
set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload
